body: Main responsibilities:To promote, structure, present and negotiate offers of the products and services of the bank to the prospect companies, including active cross selling activities with other business lines within the bank;To actively participate in the credit process of the bank, covering both standard lending and specialised lending, from the initial contact to preparation and sustaining of the proposed structure, based on financial analysis, supervising implementation and maintenance until the final reimbursement;To ensure permanent communication among the involved departments of the bank in order to solve the current business issues;To analyse market trends and identifies the eligible segments to be approached for generating new business for the bank;To develop, manage and consolidate a portfolio of corporate customers by actively promoting all the bank’s products.Requirements:University/ Master degree;At least 3 years of experience in a similar position;Very high interpersonal, negotiation and selling skills;Integrity as a core competence is a must;Able to work under pressure;Oriented toward quality;Team-player spirit;Advanced level in financial analysis skills;Fluency in English (speaking, writing, understanding) is a must;Good knowledge of banking legislation;Advanced MS Office skills.
title: (Sr.) Manager Proiect (Hunter)-Corporate Division
locations: Cluj-Napoca, Județul Cluj, România;Sibiu, Județul Sibiu, România;Str. Buzesti nr. 66-68, București, Municipiul București, România;Panu, Iași, Județul Iași, România
